channel.title: Server hosting? Where?
channel.description:
Dear people,
I go run nmy server 24/7
I want to get my server hosted but where? Some1 know a MSN of some1 that is trustable? You know people that HOST servers? You got a site where you can host Moparscape servers?
EDIT : I dont let people run it, they will steal it, he must be trustable, it will be 24/7 and yes i pay each month.
Add me on msn,
Joey.sari@hotmail.com <- dont send me emails, i never read it.
Okay, thats all, Bye`1

item.title: Server hosting? Where?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

The best bet would be to search for game servers, and then choose one that will let you run a server for any game. Most of the time if you search for keywords like dedicated servers and vps servers you will only get ones that support web hosting.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting? Where?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Hmm,
Graham, i looked some sites but most dont run Moparscape servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting? Where?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote=“mr h33lz., post:5, topic:190254”]go to www.godady.com and make ur plan not hard some are 25$ ea month and u can have 3 dedi ips[quote author=I D D S I link=topic=253684.msg2116024#msg2116024 date=1205788894]
Well, how to get a VPS, i got enough money to run it for some year,
i will pay like 50-60 each month?

  • VPS runs more then 80 players?
    [/quote][/quote]

Most sites will host web sites, not let you run a server process on the machine. That’s why they are so cheap (because running your own server program is a security risk). You’ll need to find a server that will let you host your own custom program and open some ports.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting? Where?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Cryptic V:

If you were to host it on a home PC - everything you do on the computer would effect server performance (downloading files, opening programs, etc) so the best thing would be a VPS.

Depends on how well the server is coded and the specs of the PC. A decently-coded server on a home PC with an average broadband connection could probably hold around 30 players even whilst being used for other things.

Read full topic

item.title: Server hosting? Where?
item.dc:creator: @Cryptic_V Cryptic V
item.description:
@Cryptic_V wrote:

How much are you willing to pay per month? VPS’s go from $30 to $80 a month, I highly doubt you’re an adult so this $5 or 5M rs gold a month won’t get you anything good at all, no matter what people will tell you.

If you are an adult and/or have the money, get a VPS (Virtual Private Server), it is the only thing that assures full control, uptime and security.

It’s cheaper than a fully dedicated server but it’s also less powerful, however you will not need much power plus most VPS’s are better than home PCs.

If you were to host it on a home PC - everything you do on the computer would effect server performance (downloading files, opening programs, etc) so the best thing would be a VPS.

Read full topic
